comment: Very funny and gives great feedback. I even plan ok taking a third class taught by him. Clear grading criteria and no exams
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Class grade is based off of small weekly assignments based on the lecture that week (completion grade), weekly five question quizzes also based on the lecture and then two bigger projects due near the end of the semester. He explains design terms really well. He is also really good at explaining why certain designs work and how to improve designs.

I took him for Motion Design, Visual Design 2, and Interaction Des 1 over the summer. He's funny and personable, not a strict grader.IAD classes are limited but i advise AGAINST taking ID1 in summer, the work load was crazy. Vis Design 2 one of the easiest classes i took so far. Motion design was fun, but i dropped the class it wasn't my cup of tea
Both his Visual Design II and Motion Design classes were helpful and informative, and entertaining to say the least. The projects were fun and good for portfolios.
